case_title: SHREE JANKKI SOLVENT EXTRACTIONS LTD. and 2 others vs DEPUTY DIRECTOR OF INCOME-TAX (INVESTIGATION) and others
case_number: Civil Miscellaneous/Writ Petitions Nos.189, 190 and 192 of 1995
judges: R. A. Sharma, D. K. Seth
appellant: SHREE JANKKI SOLVENT EXTRACTIONS LTD. and 2 others
respondent: DEPUTY DIRECTOR OF INCOME-TAX (INVESTIGATION) and others

key_arguments: Both tests under Section 132-A(1)(b) must be satisfied.
Documents must be relevant to a pending proceeding.
No finding of satisfaction that documents would not be produced if summons issued.
court_findings: Order issued mechanically without proper application of mind.
No recording of satisfaction or belief regarding non-production of documents.

judgment_summary.order_quashed: Order of requisition dated January 23, 1995, quashed.
judgment_summary.documents_returned: Documents to be returned to trade tax authorities.
judgment_summary.liberty_to_act: Respondents may take steps in accordance with law for assessment year 1993-94.
